channel.title: Loop animations?
channel.description:
Is there a way to make it so an animation will constantly play (for example to tree chopping) until you want it to stop?
When you just call is constantly it will play the animation, go back to your characters normal appearance, then play it again. I want to have it avoid going back to your characters normal stance because it's like chopping tree, sword and shield is out, chopping tree.
Like this: http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091224223416/runescape/images/b/bc/Woodcutting_Tree.gif
